summary: WHEN FILLING WITH CAR AT GAS STATION THE AUTO PUMP SHUT OFF DOES NOT FUNCTION SPEWING FUEL ALL OVER.  THIS HAS HAPPENED MULTIPLE TIMES AT DIFFERENT GAS STATIONS.  FUEL GAUGES ON CAR ARE NOT ACCURATE. TOOK CAR TO FORD THERE IS A TSB 15-0034 FOR THIS ISSUE.  THE FUEL TANK WAS DISTORTED/DEFORMED CAUSING THE FUEL PUMP TO MALFUNCTION OVERFLOWING INTO THE EVAP CANISTER.  THIS IS A DANGEROUS SITUATION AND IS A FIRE HAZARD  WHEN FILLING THE CAR WITH GAS.  THIS ISSUE SHOULD BE A RECALL DUE TO FIRE AND SAFETY HAZARDS.
